name: @fantech/skills
description: Shared agent skills and CLI for Fantech engineering practices

scripts.lint: oxlint src tests commit/scripts release/scripts changeset/scripts vitest.config.ts
scripts.format: oxfmt src tests commit/scripts release/scripts changeset/scripts bin package.json tsconfig.json vitest.config.ts
scripts.format:check: oxfmt --check src tests commit/scripts release/scripts changeset/scripts bin package.json tsconfig.json vitest.config.ts
scripts.precommit: bun run lint && bun run format:check && bun run typecheck
scripts.ci:test: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run test && bun run test:bun-smoke
